foreignData.name: Arena
foreignData.text: {3}, {T}: Tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, und eine Kreatur der Wahl eines Gegners, die er kontrolliert. Jede dieser Kreaturen fügt der anderen Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.

foreignData.name: Arena
foreignData.text: {3}, {T}: Gira la criatura objetivo que controlas y la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente de su elección. Cada una de esas criaturas hace daño igual a su fuerza a la otra.

foreignData.name: Arène
foreignData.text: {3}, {T} : Engagez la créature ciblée que vous contrôlez et la créature ciblée choisie par un adversaire qu'il contrôle. Chacune de ces créatures inflige à l'autre un nombre de blessures égal à sa force.

foreignData.name: Arena
foreignData.text: {3}, {T}: Scegli una creatura bersaglio che controlli. Un avversario sceglie una creatura bersaglio che controlla. TAPpa entrambe le creature. Ognuna di quelle creature infligge all'altra un ammontare di danni pari alla propria forza.

foreignData.name: 闘技場
foreignData.text: {3}, {T}：あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、いずれかの対戦相手１人が選んだ、そのプレイヤーがコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とする。 それらの各クリーチャーは、互いにもう一方に自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与え合う。

foreignData.name: Arena
foreignData.text: {3}, {T}: Vire a criatura alvo que você controla e uma criatura alvo à escolha de um oponente que ele controla. Cada uma daquelas criaturas causa dano igual ao seu poder a outra.

foreignData.name: Арена
foreignData.text: {3}, {T}: Поверните целевое существо под вашим контролем, и целевое существо под контролем противника по его или ее выбору. Эти существа наносят друг другу повреждения, равные их силе.

foreignData.name: 斗技场
foreignData.text: {3}，{T}：横置由你操控的目标生物，与由对手选择、且由其操控的目标生物。 这两个生物各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。

name: Arena
originalText: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice he or she controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to the other.

rulings.text: The power of the creatures when the effect resolves is used to determine how much damage is done.
In multiplayer games, you can choose a different opposing player each time it the ability is activated.
Either or both creatures can be tapped prior to using the ability and it still works.

If either target is illegal at the time the ability resolves (whether because it has left the battlefield, because it has gained Shroud or Protection, or for any other reason), the ability taps the remaining target, but no damage is dealt. If both targets are illegal, the ability doesn’t resolve.

text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice they control. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
